name: HairDryerSoundsforSleepandRelaxation
0:
”Alexa, open Hair Dryer Sounds”
”Alexa, launch Hair Dryer Sounds”
”Alexa, start Hair Dryer Sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hair dryer sounds
des:
Let the Hair Dryer Sounds clear your mind and take you to a quiet place of reflection.

"Hair Dryer Sounds for Sleep and Relaxation" plays calming sound loops to help you fall asleep faster, sleep better, relax, meditate, or drown out distracting noises.

The vibrations and frequencies of these powerful sounds have shown tremendous healing properties. Just relax and feel the activation of different brain centers as you go deeper with sleep sound.

By default, the sound will play until you stop it. To stop the music, say "Alexa, stop.” To resume it again, say "Alexa, resume."

SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:
Your reviews and feedback are important to us! Please consider showing your support by writing a review for Sleep Sounds.

Note: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
